score: 1 out of 6 people found the following review useful
review: Suspension of disbelief was utterly impossible through this mish-mash what a waste of talent! The mawkish sentimentality of an amateurish script coupled with embarrassingly-lengthy ECU's of Costner's dugout angst made this one soooo tough to watch. (In fact, if I had had control of the remote, this one would have been done like dinner less than half-way through.) This was not - to put it charitably - a woman's movie it was just a bad movie.
